name: Raining Death
description:
You're trapped in a scary room, and deadly objects fall from the ceiling, from spikes to boulders to bomb shells. You have to dodge them as long as you can before you inevitably die...as if you're trying to get yourself killed.

You can delay this inevitable truth even further by collecting health packs that come down every once in a (long) while.

Controls:

- Use the left and right arrow keys to move your character left and right.
